bug.author: DavidLining
bug.description: Error Log： tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.UnknownError: Failed to rename: ./models /ppo\checkpoint.tmp2fd5af3d873541a1aff8a018d0fded87 to: ./models/ppo\checkpoint : \udcbe\u073e\udcf8\udcb7\udcc3\udcce\u02a1\udca3 ; Input/output error Did anyone encounter this issue? It seems a tensorflow error.

comments.comment: It's always happened after I increased the 'max_steps'. What's wrong with it???
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/DavidLining>@DavidLining</denchmark-link> What version of Tensorflow are you using?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/eshvk>@eshvk</denchmark-link> First I used v1.4.0, then I updated it to be v1.8.0, the problem is still existed.
It seems a problem of Tensorflow. <denchmark-link:url>https://github.com/tensorflow/models/issues/4177</denchmark-link>
Thanks for the report. Like you said this seems to be a TensorFlow issue (which is still open). This issue has been inactive for a long time now so I'm going to close it for now.
Same error does anyone solved it？
